newsitem.title: CHINA: RAMATEX UNIT PLACES US$80 MLN FRN.
newsitem.headline: RAMATEX UNIT PLACES US$80 MLN FRN.

text.p: Indicative terms of the following privately placed issue were announced by coordinating manager NM Rothschild & Sons (Singapore).
The borrower is a special-purpose vehicle of Ramatex Berhad to be incorporated in Singapore.
BORROWER RAMATEX CAPITAL LTD
GUARANTOR RAMATEX BERHAD
AMOUNT US$80 MLN COUPON 6ML+85BP MATURITY 3 YRS
TYPE FRN ISS PRICE 99.80
LISTING NONE REPAYMENT BULLET DENOMS US$250K
RATING -- SALE LMTS -- PAY DATE SEP.97
NEG PLG YES CRS DEF YES FORCE MAJ --
HOME CTRY MALAYSIA/SINGAPORE GOV LAW SINGAPORE
PAY DATE SEP.97
MGT LEVELS AND FEES - NOT AVAILABLE
COORDINATING MANAGER NM ROTHSCHILD & SONS (SINGAPORE)
ARRANGERS HSBC MARKETS, MAYBANK INTERNATIONAL (L), BANQUE
PARIBAS'S LABUAN BRANCH, DKB MERCHANT BANK
(SINGAPORE), KEPPEL BANK OF SINGAPORE, PT BANK
EKSPOR IMPOR INDONESIA'S SINGAPORE BRANCH,
RABOBANK'S SINGAPORE BRANCH AND DEVELOPMENT BANK OF
SINGAPORE.
PAY AGENT HONGKONG AND SHANGHAI BANKING CORP
NOTES DIRECT AND UNCONDITIONAL. WILL RANK PARI PASSU.
PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO FINANCE THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A
HIGH TECH YARN AND SPINNING PLANT IN THE
CHINA-SINGAPORE SUZHOU INDUSTRIAL PARK IN CHINA.
THE GUARANTOR WILL MAINTAIN 100 PCT OWNERSHIP OF (I)
THE BORROWER AND (II) RAMATEX TEXTILES INDUSTRIAL SDN
BHD.
OTHER OWNERSHIP COVENANTS AND FINANCIAL COVENANTS.
